content:
ICS 32 Winter 2019 | News | Course Reference | Schedule | Project Guide | Notes and Examples | Grade Calculator | About Alex

ICS 32 Winter 2019
Course News

Check back here every day or so. I will generally post important coursewide announcements here. They will be listed in reverse-chronological order (i.e., newest items first).

Date Added News Item
W 3/27 The final course grades are now available.
Th 3/7 A few new sets of Notes and Examples are now available, along with a Schedule update.
Th 2/21 A Grade Calculator is now available.
W 2/20 Project #4 and Project #5 are now available.
M 2/18 Several additional sets of Notes and Examples are now available, along with a Schedule update.
M 2/4 Project #3 is now available.
F 1/25 Several more sets of Notes and Examples are now available, along with a Schedule update.
M 1/14 Several additional sets of Notes and Examples are now available, along with a Schedule update, as well as Project #2.
W 1/9 TAs and lab tutors are now listed in the Course Reference.
M 1/7

Welcome! Please note a couple of things as we get started this quarter:

  • The first lecture will meet on Tuesday, January 8. Lab sections begin meeting on Friday, January 11. For more information about meeting times of lab sections, see the Course Reference. For information about lecture material and readings, see the Schedule.
  • I encourage you to spend some time reading through the material on the course web site. It will be updated periodically throughout the quarter, and there will always be an announcement here describing each update. For now, notice the set of links at the top of this (and every) page, leading you to the Course Reference, the Schedule, and the Project Guide, as well as a set of Notes and Examples — mostly emanating from the lectures — that will be posted throughout the quarter.
  • Please note that a warm-up project, Project #0, is due on Friday, January 11 at 11:59pm, so you're going to want to be sure to get off to an early start on that.
